steps.assertions:
Assumed Payload: 
{
  "status" : 200,
  "body" : {
    "login" : "octocat",
    "type" : "User",
    "name" : "The Octocat",
    "location" : "San Francisco",
    "id" : "$EQ.583231"
  }
}
Assertion Errors: 
Assertion jsonPath '$.body.type' with actual value 'null' did not match the expected value 'User'
Assertion jsonPath '$.body.id' with actual value 'null' did not match the expected value '583231'
Assertion jsonPath '$.body.name' with actual value 'null' did not match the expected value 'The Octocat'
Assertion jsonPath '$.status' with actual value '403' did not match the expected value '200'
Assertion jsonPath '$.body.location' with actual value 'null' did not match the expected value 'San Francisco'
Assertion jsonPath '$.body.login' with actual value 'null' did not match the expected value 'octocat'

    "name" : "Sidd",
    "location" : "UK",
